title: Gnocchi with red chard sauce

For the red chard sauce: ½ lemon, juice and zest only
salt and freshly ground black pepper
For the gnocchi: 150g/5½oz gnocchi, cooked according to packet instructions
salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: For the red chard sauce, place all of the sauce ingredients into a bowl and mix well.
For the gnocchi, place the gnocchi into a serving bowl and drizzle with oil. Season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper and stir.
To serve, pour the sauce over the gnocchi.
